item.title: [508] ok the main things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Aphelion5 Aphelion5
item.description:
@Aphelion5 wrote:

Problem 1:

Request a random variable with:

[code]if (itemUsed == #### && usedWith == #### || itemUsed == #### && usedWith == #### ) {
pi.deleteItem(player, ####, pi.getItemSlot(player, ####), 1);
player.frames.sendMessage(player, “You learn how to make random variables work! W00t!”);
pi.addItem(player, 995, 10000);
Random chance = new Random();
float chance2 = chance.nextFloat();
chance2 = chance2 * 10;
System.out.println(“chance=”+chance2);

		if (chance2 > 0.0 && chance2 < 5.75) {
			pi.addItem(player, 995, 40000);
			pi.addItem(player, 1165, 1);
			pi.addItem(player, 1125, 1);
			pi.addItem(player, 1077, 1);
			pi.addItem(player, 4125, 1);
			pi.addItem(player, 1195, 1);
			pi.addItem(player, 1297, 1);
		}
		if (chance2 > 5.75) {
				pi.addItem(player, 995, 15000);
				pi.addItem(player, 1355, 1);
				pi.addItem(player, 1273, 1);
		}[/code]

Yes, it lacks smoothness, but it works.

2nd post - dont flame this either please.

EDIT: Oh, I’m a noob at java. I started making this 317 which failed horribly, now trying a 508 based on bulby. I started like 2 wks ago. If I, a noob, can find out this much, think about it. Otherwise, feel free to correct me where I’m wrong.

if(itemUsed == 2347 && usedWith == 11256 || itemUsed == 11256 && usedWith == 2347) { pi.deleteItem(player, 11256, pi.getItemSlot(player, 11256), 1); player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You smash the jar, the imp pop's,and out comes a random item O.O."); pi.addItem(player, 995, 100000); }

problem 2
idk how to make it when the character throws the chin it adds the fireblast to player 2. the code i have is this p2.requestGFX(346, 100);

problem 3 i cant add a custom special[and special bar] to a weapon
ok i did this compiled got no errors and it dident work

} else if (p.equipment[3] == 11716 && p.specialAmount >= 50) { //Zamorakian spear. hitDamage = Misc.random( (int) (maxMeleeHit(p) * 1.4)); p.usingSpecial = false; p.specialAmount -= 50; p.requestAnim(7181, 0); p.requestGFX(1224, 100); p2.requestGFX(348, 100);
